boardgame.name: Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies: 1942
Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies: 1942 Second Edition
Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies: Spring 1942, The World Is at War!
boardgame.description: Game description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;It's Spring 1942, and the world is at war. Five major powers struggle for supremacy: Germany and Japan are aligned against the great alliance of the United Kingdom, the Soviet Union, and the United States._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Designed for 2_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash;5 players, Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Allies: 1942 takes place at the historical high-water mark of Axis expansion. Controlling one of the Axis or Allied powers, players command both their country's military forces and its war-time economy, with the chance to plan attacks, marshal forces into embattled territories, and resolve conflicts. Victory will go to the side that conquers its opponents on the field of battle and liberates or occupies the greatest cities of the world. Change the course of history in a few short hours!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;bull;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The second edition of Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Allies: 1942 features an expanded game board (40_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;x26_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;), a change to the unit set-up, five new sculpts (UK artillery, submarine _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; destroyer units; German artillery; a Russian submarine; and antiaircraft artillery), and a few rules changes, e.g., AA-Guns have been replaced by AAA Guns, ICs have integrated air defense against strategic bombing raids, and Honolulu is now a victory city._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Wizards of the Coast - Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies 1942 Language: English 2 to 5 players 12 year and older Duration: NA New -- mint condition -- unopened -- still in shrink wrap. Weight: 1,590 kg Theme: Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies celebrates its 50th Anniversary in August 2009 with a new and updated edition of its original classic game (Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies Refreshed). Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies 1942, designed and developed by Larry Harris, will utilize the updated rules established in A_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;A Anniversary Edition. Cruiser class ships will make their début in A_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;A 1942, forever changing the naval line-up. Newly sculpted playing pieces and all new packaging will position this game as the cornerstone of the Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies game line for years to come. Decide the fate of a nation in a few short hours! See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.
English game.

Avalon Hill (WOC 250660000) Spring 1942, The World is at War! Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies celebrates it’s 25th Anniversary in August of 2009 with a new and updated edition of it’s original classic game. Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies 1942, designed and developed by Larry Harris, will utilize the updated rules established in A_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;A Anniversary Edition. Cruiser class ships will make their debut in A_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;A 1942, forever changing the naval line-up. Newly sculpted playing pieces and all new packaging will position this game as the cornerstone of the Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies game line for years to come. Decide the fate of a nation in a few short hours! Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies 1942 details: Rulebook updated by Larry Harris, creator of the Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies game system Packaging, play components, and game board map feature updated art 370 game pieces featuring refreshed sculpts plus new models for cruisers Updated naval unit rules as debuted in Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies Anniversary Edition

A_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;A 1942 2nd Edition - WotC 2012

Wizards of the Coast (WOC396880000) It’s spring 1942, and the world is at war. Five major powers struggle for supremacy: Germany and Japan are aligned against the great alliance of the United Kingdom, the Soviet Union, and the United States. Designed for 2-5 players, the game is set in 1942 - the historical high-water mark of Axis expansion. Controlling one of the Axis or Allied powers, players will command both their country’s military forces and its war-time economy, with the chance to plan attacks, marshal forces into embattled territories, and resolve conflicts. Victory will go to the side that conquers its opponents on the field of battle and liberates or occupies the greatest cities of the world. Change the course of history in a few short hours!

This is the 1st Edition (circa 2009, I believe) of Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies 1942. Box contains extra miniatures acquired from an extra copy. Nothing missing or damaged. Box has no splits or dents. Will combine shipping on multiple orders.
Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies 1942 First Edition. Like new, game only played once.
Punched but never played- just set up once or twice. In excellent condition. Kept in a dry-storage game bin, in a non-smoking, pet free home.

FIRST EDITION COPY *** With every sale we donate a percentage to the Veterans Support Foundation (including this sale). *** Wargame Depot has donated over $7,500 to this wonderful cause thanks, largely, to the wonderful Boardgamegeek community. Thank you so much for your continued support of Wargame Depot which has allowed us to give generously to the VSF. Mint, in shrink copy available. No dings, no dents, or anything wrong with the game. Non-smoking environment and kept in a humidity-controlled location. $14 shipping to US - write me for a quote to the rest of the world. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m the owner of Wargame Depot so a purchase from me will always be packed professionally and I can accept Paypal, MO/Check, or MC/Visa/Discover/AMEX. Condition - New in shrink-wrap. Payment by PayPal in advance or cash on pickup. For shipping this is considered a large size game. The following options are available for delivery within the continental United States: 1) Local pickup in the San Jose, California area (no cost) 2) USPS Priority Mail Flat Rate - $6.60 (small), $12.65 (medium), or $17.15 (large), depending on game size. Generally very small games fit in the small box, small or medium in the medium box, and large in the large box. Box fits for some games are very snug, allowing minimal protective padding - if this shipping option is picked for such games seller assumes no responsibility for damage during transit. 3) USPS Parcel Select Ground / Non-Flat Rate Priority - varies, usually only cheaper than Flat Rate Priority for small and very light weight games (under 2 pounds), an additional fee of $3.25 for the box and packing materials will be added to the shipping costs. 4) FedEx Ground - varies, usually from $12 for short distance shipments of light weight games to $30 for heavy games (or multiple games up to 10 pounds) long distance shipments. This is usually the cheapest option for very large games. An additional fee of $3.25 for the box and packing materials will be added to the shipping costs. While expensive, this is the best method if damage during transit is a concern, as all items will be packed in boxes sufficiently sized for protective materials. Shipping rates to Alaska or Hawaii will be higher for FedEx. Games will not be shipped by any method other than a shipping box, nor unboxed or in less than complete condition, please do not ask.
